subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- The jury in the trial of Mary Winkler finds her guilty of the volutary manslaughter of her preacher husband.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

>+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
CNN: Special Investigations Unit will put the terrible events
of Monday in context and look at lessons to be learned from the
tragedy. Watch "Massacre at Virginia Tech" on Saturday and
Sunday at 8 p.m. and 11 ET. http://www.cnn.com/virginiatech
